Submodules¶

google.cloud.security.scanner.scanner module¶

GCP Resource scanner.

Usage:

Run scanner: $ forseti_scanner –forseti_config
google.cloud.security.scanner.scanner.main(_)[source]¶

Run the scanners.

Args:
_ (list): argv, unused due to apputils.

google.cloud.security.scanner.scanner_builder module¶

Builds the scanners to run.

class google.cloud.security.scanner.scanner_builder.ScannerBuilder(global_configs, scanner_configs, snapshot_timestamp)[source]¶

Bases: object

Scanner Builder.

build()[source]¶

Build the enabled scanners to run.

Returns:
list: Scanner instances that will be run.

google.cloud.security.scanner.scanner_requirements_map module¶

Map of the requirements needed by the scanners.

Scanner module.
